project.name: Sunrise
project.description: Project Sunrise provides a gentoo user overlay - the team members take care of the health of the overlay

p.b: What Project Sunrise is and how it evolves

longdescription.p: Project Sunrise provides an overlay that is meant for users. It can hold any contributed ebuilds and eclasses that do not break the tree and follow QA rules. Everyone who wants to contribute can get a password by asking one of the team members. Access will be removed on abuse.
Initial focus will be on populating the overlay with the ebuilds assigned to maintainer-wanted@gentoo.org.

project.goals: Our goal is to provide a central home for contributed ebuilds that do not (yet) find a place in the portage tree

section.title: #gentoo-overlays on irc.freenode.net (if it gets too crowded we will look for a different place)

body.p: The best way to reach us is on IRC in the #gentoo-overlays channel on irc.freenode.net.
